slide-1.title: Welcome to this app
slide-1.text2: We will give you a brief introduction.

auth.changePassword-onboarding-success: Signup successful, please complete your profile

mine.summany-home-page: 选择用户登陆后,显示的第一着陆页。
mine.work-settings-remarks: 同步后，工作菜单中的待办分类将于PC端自定义查询保持一致。
mine.set-login-pw-again-new-pop: 请再输入一次6~16位新密码
mine.set-login-qz-again-new-pop: 请再输入一次6~20位新密码
mine.set-login-pw-equal-pop: 两次输入新密码不相同
mine.set-bill-summary: 根据个人喜好选择,审批工作时,表单的展现样式,原始单据为纸质表单格式,轻量单据为拆分后手机端展现格式

publicMsg.noNetwork: 您的网络不可用,请检查网络设置或稍后重试
publicMsg.noVPN: VPN隧道未建立,请重新确认网络配置
publicMsg.timeOutAlert: 您的网络环境异常,请重新请求
publicMsg.responseError400: 您输入的用户名密码有误，请重新输入！
publicMsg.loginOnce: 此账号已登录,请重新登录
publicMsg.tokenErr: 权限验证失败,请重新登录
publicMsg.openApkAlert: 请到本地内部存储Download文件夹点击apk安装
publicMsg.service-err: 后台服务维护,请稍后再试
publicMsg.necessary-info-err: 获取必要信息接口失败
publicMsg.notificationAlert: 请在设置里面打开通知

fields.name: First and last name
fields.images-hint2: Uploading a photo is not mandatory.
fields.images-hint3: NOTE: only available when running on a device (Cordova)

image-crop-dialog.subtitle2: This is what the image will look like:

field.login-email: Email (any real or fake email address)

message.email-not-verified: Your email address isn't verified yet
message.already-registered: This email adress is already registered
message.not-registered: This email adress is not registered yet
message.unknown-error: Unknown error, please check your network
message.check-your-email: Check your email and follow the instructions

An unknown error occurred.

Please check your network connection, and retry.

leave-form-popup.text:

view-form.view-error-attachment: 不支持该附件下载，请登录PC端进行查看
view-form.view-error-attachment-ios: IOS不支持该附件下载，请登录PC端进行查看
view-form.retrieve-error: 该事项下一级审批人已经查看，无法取回。如果有需要，请下一层审批人审批为不同意，单据退回至当前审批人
view-form.mask-length-err: 字数不得大于30，并且不能为空
view-form.form-data-null: 表单数据为空,请退出重新进入
view-form.table-form-different: 主从表数据不一致,请退出后重新进入

form-handle.text-error: 您输入的审批意见总字数超过500字了
form-handle.temporary-content: 将事项设为暂存待办后，该事项仍处于待办状态，您确定进行操作么
form-handle.stop-content: 审批不通过，审批流程结束，操作后无法修改，您确定进行终止操作么
form-handle.agree-content: 审批通过，事项流转至下一节点。您确定进行该操作么？
form-handle.reject-content: 确定是否拒绝本次表单的申请
form-handle.media-no-next-text: 上次录音还未完成，请稍后尝试
form-handle.attachment-undisposed-alert: 您有处理意见未进行处理，确定返回吗？
